item.title: Random Manipulation of a Random SmugMug Image
item.description: Original image source: https://photos.smugmug.com/photos/i-9vKhcGm/0/5K/i-9vKhcGm-5K.jpg Transformations performed: Sketching (sketcher) -> Style: 1 | Lineweight: 2 | Contrast: 36 | Shadow: 0.

item.title: Random Manipulation of a Random SmugMug Image
item.description: Original image source: https://photos.smugmug.com/photos/i-PF3CgSF/0/X5/i-PF3CgSF-X5.jpg Transformations performed: Median (magick) -> Pixels: 43 Modulation (magick) -> Brightness: 148 | Saturation: 136 | Hue: 123 Quantize (magick) -> Max Colors in Image: 11 Sketching (sketcher) -> Style: 1 | Lineweight: 3 | Contrast: 22 | Shadow: 0.

item.title: Random Manipulation of a Random SmugMug Image

item.title: Random Manipulation of a Random SmugMug Image
